Author: crypto999#4866
Content: Just wanted to follow up on the comment about there being no incentive for nodes to broadcast orders. As such, 1) what's in it for nodes to relay orders/manage order books and 2) incentivize them not to be bad actors?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: what incentive is there for BTC nodes to relay packets and manage the blockchain?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: or for any crypto for that matter?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: this requirement that people wont do something if they are not paid to do it, is not always valid

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: there will likely be those that are bad actors, so the important thing is that there is no economic gain, then it is just a nuisance factor. the atomic swap (with enough confirmations) is designed so that either both sides happen, or neither does

Content: @lukechilds  Hi. A new hyperdex has been released, but I still don't see any orders and can't make a swap (KMD-PGT). Maybe you can connect to team wiever and show what's wrong ? if you have free time of course.

Author: SadykovT#2123
Content: since it is possible to make one exchange per minute, there is a lack of a visible timer.

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: @SadykovT If there are no orders showing it's because there are no market makers placing orders on the BarterDEX network. This is unrelated to HyperDEX which is just a GUI interface for the BarterDEX network.

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: A lot of people seem confused with the relationship between BarterDEX and HyperDEX

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: BarterDEX is a protocol for P2P order matching and atomic swaps

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content: HyperDEX is a GUI frontend to allow you to view and interact with the BarterDEX network

Author: lukechilds#2707
Content:
As a basic analogy, Imagine the BarterDEX network is BitTorrent, and HyperDEX is your torrent client (say for example Transmission).
If you were trying to download a torrent but you had no seeders, that's an issue with the BitTorrent network, not the Transmission torrent client.
You wouldn't contact the Transmission devs and ask them to screenshare with you to get your torrent to download.

Author: SadykovT#2123
Content: I understand.
